name: Fidget Toys Trading
description:
Fidget Toys Trading is a relaxing game that makes you smile :) There are so many fidgets you can play and explore. Make profitable trades and become an expert on Fidget Toys. Play with a significant number of fidgets.

FEATURES:
• The best fidget game ever
• Unique fidget toys to collect
• Interact with fidget toys you own
• Many minigames you can try out
• Funny Winning ceremonies

See for yourself why so many others love this game!
